headline: Je suis Pando
description: Un réseau financier décentralisé construit avec le MTG qui comprend une série de protocoles financiers ouverts.
product.lake.title: Pando Lake
product.lake.subtitle: Un protocole entièrement décentralisé pour la fourniture automatisée de liquidités.
product.lake.hlight: You can swap and earn at Pando Lake or 4swap.
product.lake.hlight_text1: Pando Lake only allow for selected pools that have strong community based and proven credential.
product.lake.hlight_text2: 4swap is totally driven by the community, anyone can join the community and send request to list new pools.
product.lake.feat_text_1: Trade without the need for gas fees
product.lake.feat_text_2: Trades will be confirmed in seconds
product.lake.mtg_text: Lake & 4swap is built with Mixin Trusted Group. At present, there are 5 genesis nodes who serve the trades.
product.leaf.title: Pando Leaf
product.leaf.subtitle: Un réseau financier décentralisé, mettre en œuvre un protocole de liquidité des produits dérivés.
product.leaf.hlight: Deposit collateral to generate pUSD in Pando Leaf
product.leaf.hlight_text1: Pando USD is considered a stablecoin pegged to the US Dollar
product.leaf.feat_text_1: Pando USD is considered a stablecoin pegged to the US Dollar. You can always consider 1 pUSD for US$1.00
product.leaf.feat_text_2: The collateral rates are always higher than 200%
product.leaf.feat_text_3: You can store pUSD in any ERC20 compatible wallet
product.leaf.mtg_text: Leaf is built with Mixin Trusted Group. At present, there are 6 genesis nodes who serve the service.
product.leaf.table_text: pUSD is more secure, more importantly, and has a better future
product.leaf.table_val_collateral_assets: Cash, bonds, loans and other investments
product.rings.title: Pando Rings
product.rings.subtitle: Un protocole de taux d'intérêt algorithmique et autonome.
product.rings.hlight: A place where you can lend or borrow cryptocurrencies
product.rings.hlight_text1: Pando Rings lets users deposit cryptocurrencies and earn interest, or borrow other cryptoassets against them.
product.rings.feat_text_1: When users supply an asset to Pando Rings, they begin earning interest instantly
product.rings.feat_text_2: There is no time limit for borrowing, please rest assured to borrow
product.rings.mtg_text: Rings is built with Mixin Trusted Group. At present, there are 6 genesis nodes who serve the service.
product.fennec.title: Fennec
product.fennec.subtitle: A safe crypto wallet
product.fennec.text: Fennec makes it safe & easy for you to store, send, receive, stake, and swap tokens on Mixin Network.
product.fennec.hlight: Turn your browser into a crypto wallet
product.fennec.hlight_text1: Fennec unlocks a simple and secure way to interact with blockchain-based applications directly from your favorite web browser.
product.fennec.feat_text_1: Wallet address supports all Mixin Network tokens, such as BTC, ETH, USDC, XMR, DOGE, etc.
product.fennec.feat_text_2: Protect your assets by manually setting a password
product.fennec.feat_text_3: We never have access to any of your data or funds. Ever.
product.fennec.feat_text_4: Use our De-Fi (4swap) to safely swap tokens at the best prices, instantly.
product.root.title: Pando Root
product.root.subtitle: Le projet mystère, à venir bientôt.
dev.title: It is easy to develop dApps based on Pando
dev.text: Pando provides a set of developer-friendly APIs and SDK for third-party developers to build applications
wallet.title: Supported wallets
wallet.text: Pando series products support all Mixin network compatible wallets
3rd_party_apps.title: Pando 3rd-party Applications
3rd_party_apps.text: Pando provides a set of developer-friendly APIs and SDK for third-party developers to build applications
footer.documents.title: Documents de Pando pour les utilisateurs et développeurs
footer.blog.title: Blog officiel de Pando
